title: Transposition Model Statistics
description: Statistics summarizing information yielded by the transposition model

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be aorc:TranspositionStatistics.

count.title: Cell count
count.description: Count of cells from the gridded precipitation dataset that are containted within the watershed of interest.

mean.title: Mean Precipitation
mean.description: Mean precipitation value within transposed watershed region.

max.title: Maximum Precipitation
max.description: Maximum precipitation value within transposed watershed region.

sum.title: Summed Precipitation
sum.description: Sum of all precipitation values within transposed watershed region.

normMean.title: ATLAS14 Normalized Precipitation Mean
normMean.description: Mean precipitation value within transposed watershed region, normalized against historical precipitation data for the region
